head.title: At Parade, Mayor Gets A Birthday Greeting

identified-content.classifier: Top/News/U.S./U.S. States, Territories and Possessions/New York
Top/Classifieds/Job Market/Job Categories/Government, Philanthropy and NGO

hedline.hl1: At Parade, Mayor Gets A Birthday Greeting

abstract.p: Mayor Rudolph W Giuliani is serenaded on 56th birthday by group of Forest Hills, Queens, residents at local Memorial Day parade (S)

block.p: Mayor Rudolph W. Giuliani went to Forest Hills, Queens, yesterday to march in the community's annual Memorial Day parade. But a group of residents did not let him get away without a special performance: They sang ''Happy Birthday'' for the mayor, who turned 56 yesterday.
The birthday was yet another cause for the mayor, who has prostate cancer and is separating from his wife, to contemplate his life.

Mayor Rudolph W. Giuliani went to Forest Hills, Queens, yesterday to march in the community's annual Memorial Day parade. But a group of residents did not let him get away without a special performance: They sang ''Happy Birthday'' for the mayor, who turned 56 yesterday.
The birthday was yet another cause for the mayor, who has prostate cancer and is separating from his wife, to contemplate his life.
Despite these challenges, and his recent departure from the United States Senate race, the mayor said yesterday that he was having a ''great birthday.''

''Birthdays are terrific,'' the mayor said to reporters, shortly after a crowd of about 150 people sang for him. ''It gives you a chance to reflect on how lucky you are, how fortunate you are. I am a very, very fortunate man.''
